name: Joy to the Glow Set
about: What it is:A limited-edition, holiday kit featuring three clinically proven ExfoliKate glow boosters for softer, smoother skinu2014all at a savings..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Pineapple, Pumpkin, and Papaya Enzymes: Provides enzymatic exfoliation to reveal natural glowing skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:u2018Tis the season to glow. Get visibly softer, smoother, super-glowy skin now with these clinically proven, pore-refining ExfoliKate heroes. This luxe trio delivers fresh-from-the-clinic radiance thats pure holiday magic..This Set Contains:- 4 oz/ 118 mL ExfoliKateCleanser Daily Foaming Wash.Clinical Results:Results based on an independent clinical study of ExfoliKate Cleanser Daily Foaming Wash:
ingredients: -Pineapple, Pumpkin, and Papaya Enzymes: Provides enzymatic exfoliation to reveal natural glowing skin..-Glycolic Acid and Lactic Acid: Refines the appearance of pores and clears buildup on skins surface. .-Aloe Vera, Honey, and Vitamin E: Visibly smooths and softens skin...ExfoliKate Cleanser Daily Foaming Wash:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Stearic Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, CetearylPhosphate, Xylitylglucoside, Dimethicone PEG-8 Meadowfoamate, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Bromelain, Alcohol, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Salicylic Acid, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Ricinoleate, Isostearyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Squalane, Lactic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Propanediol, Glycolic Acid, Myristyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Sodium Hydroxide, Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Myristyl Glucoside, Cyclohexasiloxane, PEG-40 Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Maltodextrin, T-Butyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, CI 75810 (Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.ExfoliKate Cleanser Daily Foaming Wash:.-Morning and evening, apply a small amount to wet face and neck, and massage gently for 30 seconds. .-Rinse and gently pat dry. .-For optimal results, replace with the ExfoliKate Intensive Treatment twice a week in the shower. ..ExfoliKate Intensive Treatment:.-One to two times per week, apply a thin, even layer to a clean, wet face and neck, and massage gently for 30 seconds. .-Leave on for no more than two minutes. .-Rinse and gently pat dry. .-Esthetician tip: This product might cause skin to tingle and flush slightly for a short time. For sensitive skin, leave on for less than one minute and/or mix with their Goat Milk Cleanser (sold separately)...ExfoliKate Glow Moisturizer:.-Morning and evening, apply a thin, even layer to face and neck. .-Use alone or layer over KateCeuticals SuperCell Rejuvenation Serum (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full size face wash included makes it worth it alone. Love the exfoliating scrub. The moisturizer is making me break out, so I've stopped using it

I bought this set because I love the cleanser and exfoliating treatment and have used them for years, but I wanted to try the moisturizer.  The price for this set is fantastic as the cleanser is full size and if bought alone is $44. So this set is a great value. Keeps my skin looking smooth, even toned, brightened and keeps the pores clean of any buildup. I love the moisturizer, its a gel and spreads easily and sinks right in and creates a nice glow and base for makeup. I would buy this entire set again.
